page.title: 20"MY SATURDAY" BY CLAIRE.
page.content:
HOW I SPENT SATURDAY 1st JUNE 1985.
At 8:30am. I watched "The Wide Awake Club"on T.V.The presenters read out letters that viewers have sent in and sometimes they film people who have sent in the letters. After that Louise, a neighbour, who is only 2 years 7 months old came down to the Hotel, which is my home, and played with my big pink elephant. At 2pm I had to go to Sherard's fourth Birthday Party. He just lives a short way from me. Louise went with me and we had a good time. We played on the swing and the slide, and burst lots of balloons! Eight of the nine Glen Clova children were there. For tea we had salad. The different parts made a picture of a house. After that I had a piece of the ice-cream gateau with cream. It was DELICIOUS!
